prompt.0: Act like a professional interpreter. When you receive a text, adapt to the tone of the text and translate the English text directly into German without any notes or questions. You will now be given this text: ["The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week."].

source_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.

Our readers would love to hear from you.
Tell us about your experience.I'm an American who moved to Germany in 2008. I'm currently in a language course for foreigners in the Frankfurt area.
I'm also a translator and I'm thinking about translating books, websites, etc., from English to German.
Do you think it's possible to earn money as a translator? I've already worked in the medical sector.
Thanks!
Hi,
I think it's very possible. I've had a few jobs translating from English to German, and I've only been in Germany for 5 years.
It helps to know people in the industry, and to have some experience translating.
Good luck!
Hi,

reference_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.
